channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The ‘revenge tax’ buried deep in the budget bill could turn a trade war into a ‘capital war,’ analyst says
item.description: Section 899 of the "One Big Beautiful Bill" moving through Congress has raised growing alarms on Wall Street.

item.title: Iran has amassed even more near weapons-grade uranium, UN watchdog says
item.description: The report by the International Atomic Energy Agency says that as of May 17, Iran has amassed 900.8 pounds of uranium enriched up to 60%.

item.title: Elon Musk’s court fights to outlast his time at White House
item.description: “While he may have left Washington, the havoc he has created has not.”

item.title: Gen Z and boomers are driving a leadership vacuum that’s threatening productivity and morale at work
item.description: A workplace strategist says major companies should be run like small businesses to keep employees in the leadership pipeline.

item.title: State and local health departments that do invisible but critical work are being hollowed out by cuts
item.description: The moves reflect a shift that Americans may not fully realize, away from the very idea of public health: doing the work that no individual can do alo...
